divs: sighting detailsdriving due east on social row road approximately 100 yards east of state route 48. i was driving to my parents house and i was alone. witnessed circular light approximately the size of a pea at arms length hovering in sky 30 degrees above horizon and 20 degrees north of due east. object was a white very bright light, slightly blue in color (similar to high intensity discharge lighting). object was stationary for approximately 2 seconds then shot towards earth behind houses. object didn't appear to accelerate, it went from stationary to full speed instantly. it appeared to be about a 1\4 mile to 1\2 mile away from me. i proceeded to drive to were the object appeared to fall, but i was unable to locate it.
